msIdentifier.repository: Topkapı Palace Museum (Topkapı Sarayı Müzesi) , Istanbul

summary.p: 1 fol.; Writing surface: parchment; Shelfmark: E. H. 38; Text: Q 37:76-145; 17 lines per page; Dimensions: 315 x 223 mm; Script style: kūfī; Estimated date of production: 2nd (8th) to 3rd (9th) centuries [according to Karatay].

This entry is based on the catalogue of Fehmi E. Karatay (1888-1968). Currently we do not have access to the images. With exceptions, the catalogue does not contain precise information on the distribution of the text throughout the pages. For this reason, only fol. 1 is given.

Karatay (1962) describes the manuscripts as follows, p. 15: "39 E. H. 38 Kur’an’dan bir yaprak Parşömen. 223mm boy ve 315mm eninde bir yaprak. Sahifede II-III. (VIII-IX) asır kûfîsiyle 260mm uzunl.[uğunda] 17 satır. Yaprağın sağ alt kenarı yırtılmıştır. Ṣaffat (37) suresinin 76. ayeti olan ونجيناه وأهله من الكرب العظيم ile başlıyor ve aynı surenin 145. ayeti فنبذناه ... ile bitiyor."

This can be translated as follows: "39 E. H. 38 A leaf of the Qurʾān Parchment. One leaf of 223 mm height and 315 mm width. The text area written in Kufic script of 2nd-3rd (8th-9th) centuries [contains] 17 lines measuring 260 mm. The lower right edge of the leaf is torn. It starts with the words ونجيناه وأهله من الكرب العظيم of Q 37:76 (Sūra al-Ṣāffāt) and ends with فنبذناه ... of verse 145 of the same sūra."
